ops.description: Bank[6][9] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // Bugenhagen
“Good.
Then we shall proceed.”
{ let pos = getPartyMemberPosition({partyId:0}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

“What is it? You're going back?
I'll be waiting here for you
when you're ready.”{PAUSE}“I can't leave this door
open forever.”
